content:
ShellHeaderItemsVisibility Enum

Definition

Specifies the visibility of shell header items.

In this Article

[System.Flags]
public enum ShellHeaderItemsVisibility
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
System.Enum
ShellHeaderItemsVisibility

Fields

All

All items are visible.
Breadcrumb

The breadcrumb is visible.
CollapseAll

Collapse all is visible.
ExpandAll

Expand all is visible.
None

None is visible.
